SongLyrics.JpnStr: 雨降[あめふ]りでも傘[かさ]はささないの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even when it's raining, I don't use an umbrella

SongLyrics.JpnStr: (初[はじ]めましてと猫[ねこ]は鳴[な]く)
SongLyrics.EngStr: ('It's a pleasure to meet you', the cat meows)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: お気[き]に入[い]りのヒールを濡[ぬ]らすの
SongLyrics.EngStr: My most beloved high heels get soaked

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 何気[なにげ]ないような日常[にちじょう]が今[いま]ほら
SongLyrics.EngStr: See now, how the run-of-the-mill everyday life

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 変[か]わりたいと藍色[あいいろ]に染[そ]まりだす
SongLyrics.EngStr: Is being dyed in blue as if wanting to change

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 水[みず]たまりに映[うつ]る一秒間[いちびょうかん]
SongLyrics.EngStr: That one second when it appears in the puddle

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ただ一度[いちど]この目[め]で見[み]てみたいだけなの
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just want to see it once with my own eyes, that's all

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 踊[おど]るよ 世界[せかい]が 揺[ゆ]らいで 廻[まわ]るの!
SongLyrics.EngStr: I am dancing, the whole world shaking up, goes round and round!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 届[とど]くよ 速度[そくど]を上[あ]げて
SongLyrics.EngStr: We will reach it! So let's pick up the pace!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 駆[か]け出[だ]したいの 明日[あした]まで ひとっ飛[と]び
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just want to break away and run to tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 昨日[きのう]の彼[かれ]も朝焼[あさや]けもいないけど それでそれでいいの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Since you're stuck in yesterday, if another sunrise never came, it's okay, it's okay with me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ずっと続[つづ]いてく きっと進[すす]んでる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll kust keep moving on, always going forward

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もっと愛[あい]してる! 日々[ひび]を君[きみ]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: I will love you more and more! Everyday, with you

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いっそ七転[ななころ]んで 何回起[なんかいお]き上[あ]がって
SongLyrics.EngStr: I may fall seven times, but I will keep on moving

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そうやってまた今日[きょう]を想[おも]い合[あ]えてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I keep on thinking of you, together with me today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 頬[ほほ]を伝[つた]う彼女[かのじょ]の雫[しずく]は
SongLyrics.EngStr: The girl's tears fall down her cheek

SongLyrics.JpnStr: (みてみぬふり猫[ねこ]は鳴[な]く)
SongLyrics.EngStr: (The cat meows, pretending not to see)

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 俯[うつむ]いたsink 退屈並[たいくつなら]べた
SongLyrics.EngStr: Looking down the sink, the boredom starts piling up

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 優[やさ]しさで紡[つむ]がれた嘘[うそ]でも
SongLyrics.EngStr: All these lies woven from kindness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 悲[かな]しみに彩[いろど]られた実[じつ]でも
SongLyrics.EngStr: Or the truth, tainted by bitterness

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 水[みず]たまりに騒[さわ]ぐ雨粒[あまつぶ]の
SongLyrics.EngStr: The noise of the raindrops falling into the puddle

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ふちをそっと指先[ゆびさき]でなぞるよう
SongLyrics.EngStr: As your fingertips are gently tracing the edge

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 描[えが]いて 奏[かな]でて きらめく 願[ねが]いが 叶[かな]うよ!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Draw it out! Play it out! The sparkling wishes will come true!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 届[とど]くよ 高度[こうど]を上[あ]げて
SongLyrics.EngStr: We will reach it! So let's raise the pace!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 駆[か]け抜[ぬ]けたいの 宇宙[うちゅう]まで ひとっ飛[と]び
SongLyrics.EngStr: I want to run so fast that I can make it to space in just one jump

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 浮[う]かべた星[ほし]も月[つき]にも会[あ]えないけど それでそれでいいの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even if I cannot go reach the stars and moon high above, it's okay, it's okay with me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ずっと続[つづ]いてく きっと進[すす]んでる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll just keep moving on, always going forward

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もっと愛[あい]してる! 日々[ひび]と君[きみ]と
SongLyrics.EngStr: More and more I love, these precious days with you!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いっそうずくまって 何回泣[なんかいな]きじゃくって
SongLyrics.EngStr: As I cower here, how many times must I cry

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そうやってまた今日[きょう]と巡[めぐ]りあえてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: Just to see you today!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]を照[て]らしてブルームーン
SongLyrics.EngStr: The blue moon shines bright on me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 長[なが]い夢[ゆめ]からもう覚[さ]めた
SongLyrics.EngStr: As I awake from a long, long dream

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 明日[あす]の方角[ほうがく]へ連[つ]れてってよ!
SongLyrics.EngStr: Carry me away to tomorrow's future

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 速度[そくど]を上[あ]げて
SongLyrics.EngStr: So let's pick up the pace!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 駆[か]け出[だ]したいの 明日[あした]まで ひとっ飛[と]び
SongLyrics.EngStr: I just want to break away and run to tomorrow

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 昨日[きのう]の彼[かれ]も夕焼[ゆうや]けもいないけど それでそれでいいの
SongLyrics.EngStr: Since you're stuck in yesterday, if another sunset never came, it's okay, it's okay with me

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ずっと続[つづ]いてく きっと進[すす]んでる
SongLyrics.EngStr: I'll kust keep moving on, always going forward

SongLyrics.JpnStr: もっと愛[あい]してる! 日々[ひび]も君[きみ]も
SongLyrics.EngStr: I will love you more and more, everyday with you!

SongLyrics.JpnStr: いっそ七転[ななころ]んで 何回起[なんかいお]き上[あ]がって
SongLyrics.EngStr: I may fall seven times, but I will keep on moving

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そうやってまた今日[きょう]も巡[めぐ]り合[あ]えてる
SongLyrics.EngStr: So that I may have a chance to see you today

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 想[おも]い合[あ]っていく これからずっと
SongLyrics.EngStr: Let's keep loving each other forever and always!

ListVocab: 初めまして-はじめまして
お気に入り-おきにいり

染まりだす-そまりだす
一秒間-いちびょうかん
見てみたい-みてみたい
駆け出したい-かけだしたい
ひとっ飛び-ひとっとび
起き上がって-おきあがって

想い合えてる-おもいあえてる
みてみぬふり-みてみぬふり
彩られた-いろどられた
駆け抜けたい-かけぬけたい
ずくまって-ずくまって
泣きじゃくって-なきじゃくって
